name: Rogue Mech
description:
IMPORTANT:

This is a Test Level made to showcase the game systems.

Test the different weapons and loot system and kill some enemy turrets.

Controls:

WASD Keys for movement.

Mouse - Aim

Mouse Wheel Up / E - Zoom In

Mouse Wheel Down / Q - Zoom out

Left Mouse Button - Shoot left weapon

Right Mouse Button - Shoot right weapon

Tab - Open Loot Menu (only when over dead enemy)

Esc - Options Menu

Alt + Enter - Toggle Full Screen
